thread.title: Undercover fed agent gets six years for Silk Road bitcoin theft

title: Undercover fed agent gets six years for Silk Road bitcoin theft
text:
Undercover fed agent gets six years for Silk Road bitcoin theft 
The Inquirer Thursday 22nd October, 2015 
, who was also known as Nob, was an investigator into the Silk Road, its wares and its people. He had worked for the agency for 15 years before things started to unravel. 
The former agent got a tough time in the courts, according to...
